quotes.quote: I tell ya, instead of being alone in a group, it's better to have real solitude all by yourself.
quotes.author: Faye Valentine, Cowboy Bebop

quotes.quote: Everything has a beginning and an end. Life is just a cycle of starts and stops. There are ends we don't desire, but they're inevitable, we have to face them. It's what being human is all about.
quotes.author: Jet Black, Cowboy Bebop
